EMAIL_INCORRECT_FORMAT: Email must be in correct format
EMAIL_NOT_UNIQUE: This email is already in use
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long
FIRST_NAME_MIN_MAX_LENGTH: First name must be between 2-15 characters long
LAST_NAME_MIN_MAX_LENGTH: Last name must be between 2-20 characters long
DISPLAY_NAME_MIN_MAX_LENGTH: Display name must be between 3-10 characters long
DISPLAY_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE: This display name is already in use
